00047 /**************************** Interlace/Deinterlace **************************/
00048 
00049 void IMB_de_interlace(ImBuf *ibuf)
00050 {
00051     ImBuf * tbuf1, * tbuf2;
00052     
00053     if (ibuf == NULL) return;
00054     if (ibuf->flags & IB_fields) return;
00055     ibuf->flags |= IB_fields;
00056     
00057     if (ibuf->rect) {
00058         /* make copies */
00059         tbuf1 = IMB_allocImBuf(ibuf->x, ibuf->y / 2, 32, IB_rect);
00060         tbuf2 = IMB_allocImBuf(ibuf->x, ibuf->y / 2, 32, IB_rect);
00061         
00062         ibuf->x *= 2;   
00063         IMB_rectcpy(tbuf1, ibuf, 0, 0, 0, 0, ibuf->x, ibuf->y);
00064         IMB_rectcpy(tbuf2, ibuf, 0, 0, tbuf2->x, 0, ibuf->x, ibuf->y);
00065     
00066         ibuf->x /= 2;
00067         IMB_rectcpy(ibuf, tbuf1, 0, 0, 0, 0, tbuf1->x, tbuf1->y);
00068         IMB_rectcpy(ibuf, tbuf2, 0, tbuf2->y, 0, 0, tbuf2->x, tbuf2->y);
00069         
00070         IMB_freeImBuf(tbuf1);
00071         IMB_freeImBuf(tbuf2);
00072     }
00073     ibuf->y /= 2;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void IMB_interlace(ImBuf *ibuf)
00077 {
00078     ImBuf * tbuf1, * tbuf2;
00079 
00080     if (ibuf == NULL) return;
00081     ibuf->flags &= ~IB_fields;
00082 
00083     ibuf->y *= 2;
00084 
00085     if (ibuf->rect) {
00086         /* make copies */
00087         tbuf1 = IMB_allocImBuf(ibuf->x, ibuf->y / 2, 32, IB_rect);
00088         tbuf2 = IMB_allocImBuf(ibuf->x, ibuf->y / 2, 32, IB_rect);
00089 
00090         IMB_rectcpy(tbuf1, ibuf, 0, 0, 0, 0, ibuf->x, ibuf->y);
00091         IMB_rectcpy(tbuf2, ibuf, 0, 0, 0, tbuf2->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y);
00092 
00093         ibuf->x *= 2;
00094         IMB_rectcpy(ibuf, tbuf1, 0, 0, 0, 0, tbuf1->x, tbuf1->y);
00095         IMB_rectcpy(ibuf, tbuf2, tbuf2->x, 0, 0, 0, tbuf2->x, tbuf2->y);
00096         ibuf->x /= 2;
00097 
00098         IMB_freeImBuf(tbuf1);
00099         IMB_freeImBuf(tbuf2);
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00103 /************************* Floyd-Steinberg dithering *************************/
00104 
00105 typedef struct DitherContext {
00106     int *error_buf, *e;
00107     int v[4], v0[4], v1[4];
00108     float f;
00109 } DitherContext;
00110 
00111 DitherContext *create_dither_context(int w, float factor)
00112 {
00113     DitherContext *di;
00114     int i;
00115     
00116     di= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DitherContext), "dithering context");
00117     di->f= factor / 16.0f;
00118     di->error_buf= MEM_callocN(4*(w+1)*sizeof(int), "dithering error");
00119     di->e= di->error_buf;
00120 
00121     for (i=0; i<4; ++i)
00122         di->v[i]= di->v0[i]= di->v1[i]= 1024.0f*(BLI_frand()-0.5f);
00123 
00124     return di;
00125 }
00126 
00127 static void clear_dither_context(DitherContext *di)
00128 {
00129     MEM_freeN(di->error_buf);
00130     MEM_freeN(di);
00131 }
00132 
00133 static void dither_finish_row(DitherContext *di)
00134 {
00135     int i;
00136 
00137     for (i=0; i<4; i++)
00138         di->v[i]= di->v0[i]= di->v1[i] = 0;
00139 
00140     di->e= di->error_buf;
00141 }
00142 
00143 MINLINE unsigned char dither_value(unsigned short v_in, DitherContext *di, int i)
00144 {
00145     int dv, d2;
00146     unsigned char v_out;
00147 
00148     di->v[i] = v_in + (2*di->v[i] + di->e[4]) * di->f;
00149     CLAMP(di->v[i], 0, 0xFF00);
00150     v_out = USHORTTOUCHAR(di->v[i]);
00151     di->v[i] -= v_out<<8;
00152     dv = di->v[i];
00153     d2 = di->v[i]<<1;
00154     di->v[i] += d2;
00155     *(di->e++) = di->v[i] + di->v0[i];
00156     di->v[i] += d2;
00157 
00158     di->v0[i] = di->v[i] + di->v1[i];
00159     di->v1[i] = dv;
00160     di->v[i] += d2;
00161 
00162     return v_out;
00163 }
00164 
00165 /************************* Generic Buffer Conversion *************************/
00166 
00167 MINLINE void ushort_to_byte_v4(uchar b[4], const unsigned short us[4])
00168 {
00169     b[0]= USHORTTOUCHAR(us[0]);
00170     b[1]= USHORTTOUCHAR(us[1]);
00171     b[2]= USHORTTOUCHAR(us[2]);
00172     b[3]= USHORTTOUCHAR(us[3]);
00173 }
00174 
00175 MINLINE void ushort_to_byte_dither_v4(uchar b[4], const unsigned short us[4], DitherContext *di)
00176 {
00177     b[0]= dither_value(us[0], di, 0);
00178     b[1]= dither_value(us[1], di, 1);
00179     b[2]= dither_value(us[2], di, 2);
00180     b[3]= dither_value(us[3], di, 3);
00181 }
00182 
00183 MINLINE void float_to_byte_dither_v4(uchar b[4], const float f[4], DitherContext *di)
00184 {
00185     unsigned short us[4] = {FTOUSHORT(f[0]), FTOUSHORT(f[1]), FTOUSHORT(f[2]), FTOUSHORT(f[3])};
00186     ushort_to_byte_dither_v4(b, us, di);
00187 }
00188 
00189 /* float to byte pixels, output 4-channel RGBA */
00190 void IMB_buffer_byte_from_float(uchar *rect_to, const float *rect_from,
00191     int channels_from, float dither, int profile_to, int profile_from, int predivide,
00192     int width, int height, int stride_to, int stride_from)
00193 {
00194     float tmp[4];
00195     int x, y;
00196     DitherContext *di;
00197 
00198     /* we need valid profiles */
00199     BLI_assert(profile_to != IB_PROFILE_NONE);
00200     BLI_assert(profile_from != IB_PROFILE_NONE);
00201 
00202     BLI_init_srgb_conversion();
00203     if (dither)
00204         di= create_dither_context(width, dither);
00205 
00206     for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00207         if (channels_from == 1) {
00208         /* single channel input */
00209             const float *from = rect_from + stride_from*y;
00210             uchar *to = rect_to + stride_to*y*4;
00211 
00212             for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from++, to+=4)
00213                 to[0] = to[1] = to[2] = to[3] = FTOCHAR(from[0]);
00214         }
00215         else if (channels_from == 3) {
00216         /* RGB input */
00217             const float *from = rect_from + stride_from*y*3;
00218             uchar *to = rect_to + stride_to*y*4;
00219 
00220             if (profile_to == profile_from) {
00221                 /* no color space conversion */
00222                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=3, to+=4) {
00223                     rgb_float_to_uchar(to, from);
00224                     to[3] = 255;
00225                 }
00226             }
00227             else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_SRGB) {
00228                 /* convert from linear to sRGB */
00229                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=3, to+=4) {
00230                     linearrgb_to_srgb_v3_v3(tmp, from);
00231                     rgb_float_to_uchar(to, tmp);
00232                     to[3] = 255;
00233                 }
00234             }
00235             else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB) {
00236                 /* convert from sRGB to linear */
00237                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=3, to+=4) {
00238                     srgb_to_linearrgb_v3_v3(tmp, from);
00239                     rgb_float_to_uchar(to, tmp);
00240                     to[3] = 255;
00241                 }
00242             }
00243         }
00244         else if (channels_from == 4) {
00245         /* RGBA input */
00246             const float *from = rect_from + stride_from*y*4;
00247             uchar *to = rect_to + stride_to*y*4;
00248 
00249             if (profile_to == profile_from) {
00250                 /* no color space conversion */
00251                 if (dither) {
00252                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4)
00253                         float_to_byte_dither_v4(to, from, di);
00254                 }
00255                 else {
00256                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4)
00257                         rgba_float_to_uchar(to, from);
00258                 }
00259             }
00260             else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_SRGB) {
00261                 /* convert from linear to sRGB */
00262                 unsigned short us[4];
00263 
00264                 if (dither && predivide) {
00265                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00266                         linearrgb_to_srgb_ushort4_predivide(us, from);
00267                         ushort_to_byte_dither_v4(to, us, di);
00268                     }
00269                 }
00270                 else if (dither) {
00271                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00272                         linearrgb_to_srgb_ushort4(us, from);
00273                         ushort_to_byte_dither_v4(to, us, di);
00274                     }
00275                 }
00276                 else if (predivide) {
00277                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00278                         linearrgb_to_srgb_ushort4_predivide(us, from);
00279                         ushort_to_byte_v4(to, us);
00280                     }
00281                 }
00282                 else {
00283                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00284                         linearrgb_to_srgb_ushort4(us, from);
00285                         ushort_to_byte_v4(to, us);
00286                     }
00287                 }
00288             }
00289             else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB) {
00290                 /* convert from sRGB to linear */
00291                 if (dither && predivide) {
00292                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00293                         srgb_to_linearrgb_predivide_v4(tmp, from);
00294                         float_to_byte_dither_v4(to, tmp, di);
00295                     }
00296                 }
00297                 else if (dither) {
00298                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00299                         srgb_to_linearrgb_v4(tmp, from);
00300                         float_to_byte_dither_v4(to, tmp, di);
00301                     }
00302                 }
00303                 else if (predivide) {
00304                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00305                         srgb_to_linearrgb_predivide_v4(tmp, from);
00306                         rgba_float_to_uchar(to, tmp);
00307                     }
00308                 }
00309                 else {
00310                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00311                         srgb_to_linearrgb_v4(tmp, from);
00312                         rgba_float_to_uchar(to, tmp);
00313                     }
00314                 }
00315             }
00316         }
00317 
00318         if (dither)
00319             dither_finish_row(di);
00320     }
00321 
00322     if (dither)
00323         clear_dither_context(di);
00324 }
00325 
00326 /* byte to float pixels, input and output 4-channel RGBA  */
00327 void IMB_buffer_float_from_byte(float *rect_to, const uchar *rect_from,
00328     int profile_to, int profile_from, int predivide,
00329     int width, int height, int stride_to, int stride_from)
00330 {
00331     float tmp[4];
00332     int x, y;
00333 
00334     /* we need valid profiles */
00335     BLI_assert(profile_to != IB_PROFILE_NONE);
00336     BLI_assert(profile_from != IB_PROFILE_NONE);
00337 
00338     BLI_init_srgb_conversion();
00339 
00340     /* RGBA input */
00341     for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00342         const uchar *from = rect_from + stride_from*y*4;
00343         float *to = rect_to + stride_to*y*4;
00344 
00345         if (profile_to == profile_from) {
00346             /* no color space conversion */
00347             for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4)
00348                 rgba_uchar_to_float(to, from);
00349         }
00350         else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB) {
00351             /* convert sRGB to linear */
00352             if (predivide) {
00353                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00354                     srgb_to_linearrgb_uchar4_predivide(to, from);
00355                 }
00356             }
00357             else {
00358                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00359                     srgb_to_linearrgb_uchar4(to, from);
00360                 }
00361             }
00362         }
00363         else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_SRGB) {
00364             /* convert linear to sRGB */
00365             if (predivide) {
00366                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00367                     rgba_uchar_to_float(tmp, from);
00368                     linearrgb_to_srgb_predivide_v4(to, tmp);
00369                 }
00370             }
00371             else {
00372                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00373                     rgba_uchar_to_float(tmp, from);
00374                     linearrgb_to_srgb_v4(to, tmp);
00375                 }
00376             }
00377         }
00378     }
00379 }
00380 
00381 /* float to float pixels, output 4-channel RGBA */
00382 void IMB_buffer_float_from_float(float *rect_to, const float *rect_from,
00383     int channels_from, int profile_to, int profile_from, int predivide,
00384     int width, int height, int stride_to, int stride_from)
00385 {
00386     int x, y;
00387 
00388     /* we need valid profiles */
00389     BLI_assert(profile_to != IB_PROFILE_NONE);
00390     BLI_assert(profile_from != IB_PROFILE_NONE);
00391 
00392     if (channels_from==1) {
00393         /* single channel input */
00394         for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00395             const float *from = rect_from + stride_from*y;
00396             float *to = rect_to + stride_to*y*4;
00397 
00398             for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from++, to+=4)
00399                 to[0] = to[1] = to[2] = to[3] = from[0];
00400         }
00401     }
00402     else if (channels_from == 3) {
00403         /* RGB input */
00404         for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00405             const float *from = rect_from + stride_from*y*3;
00406             float *to = rect_to + stride_to*y*4;
00407 
00408             if (profile_to == profile_from) {
00409                 /* no color space conversion */
00410                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=3, to+=4) {
00411                     copy_v3_v3(to, from);
00412                     to[3] = 1.0f;
00413                 }
00414             }
00415             else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB) {
00416                 /* convert from sRGB to linear */
00417                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=3, to+=4) {
00418                     srgb_to_linearrgb_v3_v3(to, from);
00419                     to[3] = 1.0f;
00420                 }
00421             }
00422             else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_SRGB) {
00423                 /* convert from linear to sRGB */
00424                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=3, to+=4) {
00425                     linearrgb_to_srgb_v3_v3(to, from);
00426                     to[3] = 1.0f;
00427                 }
00428             }
00429         }
00430     }
00431     else if (channels_from == 4) {
00432         /* RGBA input */
00433         for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00434             const float *from = rect_from + stride_from*y*4;
00435             float *to = rect_to + stride_to*y*4;
00436 
00437             if (profile_to == profile_from) {
00438                 /* same profile, copy */
00439                 memcpy(to, from, sizeof(float)*4*width);
00440             }
00441             else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB) {
00442                 /* convert to sRGB to linear */
00443                 if (predivide) {
00444                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4)
00445                         srgb_to_linearrgb_predivide_v4(to, from);
00446                 }
00447                 else {
00448                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4)
00449                         srgb_to_linearrgb_v4(to, from);
00450                 }
00451             }
00452             else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_SRGB) {
00453                 /* convert from linear to sRGB */
00454                 if (predivide) {
00455                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4)
00456                         linearrgb_to_srgb_predivide_v4(to, from);
00457                 }
00458                 else {
00459                     for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4)
00460                         linearrgb_to_srgb_v4(to, from);
00461                 }
00462             }
00463         }
00464     }
00465 }
00466 
00467 /* byte to byte pixels, input and output 4-channel RGBA */
00468 void IMB_buffer_byte_from_byte(uchar *rect_to, const uchar *rect_from,
00469     int profile_to, int profile_from, int predivide,
00470     int width, int height, int stride_to, int stride_from)
00471 {
00472     float tmp[4];
00473     int x, y;
00474 
00475     /* we need valid profiles */
00476     BLI_assert(profile_to != IB_PROFILE_NONE);
00477     BLI_assert(profile_from != IB_PROFILE_NONE);
00478 
00479     /* always RGBA input */
00480     for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00481         const uchar *from = rect_from + stride_from*y*4;
00482         uchar *to = rect_to + stride_to*y*4;
00483 
00484         if (profile_to == profile_from) {
00485             /* same profile, copy */
00486             memcpy(to, from, sizeof(uchar)*4*width);
00487         }
00488         else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB) {
00489             /* convert to sRGB to linear */
00490             if (predivide) {
00491                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00492                     rgba_uchar_to_float(tmp, from);
00493                     srgb_to_linearrgb_predivide_v4(tmp, tmp);
00494                     rgba_float_to_uchar(to, tmp);
00495                 }
00496             }
00497             else {
00498                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00499                     rgba_uchar_to_float(tmp, from);
00500                     srgb_to_linearrgb_v4(tmp, tmp);
00501                     rgba_float_to_uchar(to, tmp);
00502                 }
00503             }
00504         }
00505         else if (profile_to == IB_PROFILE_SRGB) {
00506             /* convert from linear to sRGB */
00507             if (predivide) {
00508                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00509                     rgba_uchar_to_float(tmp, from);
00510                     linearrgb_to_srgb_predivide_v4(tmp, tmp);
00511                     rgba_float_to_uchar(to, tmp);
00512                 }
00513             }
00514             else {
00515                 for (x = 0; x < width; x++, from+=4, to+=4) {
00516                     rgba_uchar_to_float(tmp, from);
00517                     linearrgb_to_srgb_v4(tmp, tmp);
00518                     rgba_float_to_uchar(to, tmp);
00519                 }
00520             }
00521         }
00522     }
00523 }
00524 
00525 /****************************** ImBuf Conversion *****************************/
00526 
00527 void IMB_rect_from_float(ImBuf *ibuf)
00528 {
00529     int predivide= (ibuf->flags & IB_cm_predivide);
00530     int profile_from;
00531 
00532     /* verify we have a float buffer */
00533     if (ibuf->rect_float==NULL)
00534         return;
00535 
00536     /* create byte rect if it didn't exist yet */
00537     if (ibuf->rect==NULL)
00538         imb_addrectImBuf(ibuf);
00539 
00540     /* determine profiles */
00541     if (ibuf->profile == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB)
00542         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
00543     else if (ELEM(ibuf->profile, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, IB_PROFILE_NONE))
00544         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00545     else
00546         BLI_assert(0);
00547 
00548     /* do conversion */
00549     IMB_buffer_byte_from_float((uchar*)ibuf->rect, ibuf->rect_float,
00550         ibuf->channels, ibuf->dither, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, profile_from, predivide,
00551         ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00552 
00553     /* ensure user flag is reset */
00554     ibuf->userflags &= ~IB_RECT_INVALID;
00555 }
00556 
00557 /* converts from linear float to sRGB byte for part of the texture, buffer will hold the changed part */
00558 void IMB_partial_rect_from_float(ImBuf *ibuf, float *buffer, int x, int y, int w, int h)
00559 {
00560     float *rect_float;
00561     uchar *rect_byte;
00562     int predivide= (ibuf->flags & IB_cm_predivide);
00563     int profile_from;
00564 
00565     /* verify we have a float buffer */
00566     if (ibuf->rect_float==NULL || buffer==NULL)
00567         return;
00568 
00569     /* create byte rect if it didn't exist yet */
00570     if (ibuf->rect==NULL)
00571         imb_addrectImBuf(ibuf);
00572 
00573     /* determine profiles */
00574     if (ibuf->profile == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB)
00575         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
00576     else if (ELEM(ibuf->profile, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, IB_PROFILE_NONE))
00577         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00578     else
00579         BLI_assert(0);
00580 
00581     /* do conversion */
00582     rect_float= ibuf->rect_float + (x + y*ibuf->x)*ibuf->channels;
00583     rect_byte= (uchar*)ibuf->rect + (x + y*ibuf->x)*4;
00584 
00585     IMB_buffer_float_from_float(buffer, rect_float,
00586         ibuf->channels, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, profile_from, predivide,
00587         w, h, w, ibuf->x);
00588 
00589     IMB_buffer_byte_from_float(rect_byte, buffer,
00590         4, ibuf->dither, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, 0,
00591         w, h, ibuf->x, w);
00592 
00593     /* ensure user flag is reset */
00594     ibuf->userflags &= ~IB_RECT_INVALID;
00595 }
00596 
00597 void IMB_float_from_rect(ImBuf *ibuf)
00598 {
00599     int predivide= (ibuf->flags & IB_cm_predivide);
00600     int profile_from;
00601 
00602     /* verify if we byte and float buffers */
00603     if (ibuf->rect==NULL)
00604         return;
00605 
00606     if (ibuf->rect_float==NULL)
00607         if (imb_addrectfloatImBuf(ibuf) == 0)
00608             return;
00609     
00610     /* determine profiles */
00611     if (ibuf->profile == IB_PROFILE_NONE)
00612         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
00613     else
00614         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00615     
00616     /* do conversion */
00617     IMB_buffer_float_from_byte(ibuf->rect_float, (uchar*)ibuf->rect,
00618         IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB, profile_from, predivide,
00619         ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00620 }
00621 
00622 /* no profile conversion */
00623 void IMB_float_from_rect_simple(ImBuf *ibuf)
00624 {
00625     int predivide= (ibuf->flags & IB_cm_predivide);
00626 
00627     if (ibuf->rect_float==NULL)
00628         imb_addrectfloatImBuf(ibuf);
00629 
00630     IMB_buffer_float_from_byte(ibuf->rect_float, (uchar*)ibuf->rect,
00631         IB_PROFILE_SRGB, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, predivide,
00632         ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00633 }
00634 
00635 void IMB_convert_profile(ImBuf *ibuf, int profile)
00636 {
00637     int predivide= (ibuf->flags & IB_cm_predivide);
00638     int profile_from, profile_to;
00639 
00640     if (ibuf->profile == profile)
00641         return;
00642 
00643     /* determine profiles */
00644     if (ibuf->profile == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB)
00645         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
00646     else if (ELEM(ibuf->profile, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, IB_PROFILE_NONE))
00647         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00648     else {
00649         BLI_assert(0);
00650         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_SRGB; /* dummy, should never happen */
00651     }
00652 
00653     if (profile == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB)
00654         profile_to = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
00655     else if (ELEM(profile, IB_PROFILE_SRGB, IB_PROFILE_NONE))
00656         profile_to = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00657     else {
00658         BLI_assert(0);
00659         profile_to = IB_PROFILE_SRGB; /* dummy, should never happen */
00660     }
00661     
00662     /* do conversion */
00663     if (ibuf->rect_float) {
00664         IMB_buffer_float_from_float(ibuf->rect_float, ibuf->rect_float,
00665             4, profile_to, profile_from, predivide,
00666             ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00667     }
00668 
00669     if (ibuf->rect) {
00670         IMB_buffer_byte_from_byte((uchar*)ibuf->rect, (uchar*)ibuf->rect,
00671             profile_to, profile_from, predivide,
00672             ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00673     }
00674 
00675     /* set new profile */
00676     ibuf->profile= profile;
00677 }
00678 
00679 /* use when you need to get a buffer with a certain profile
00680  * if the return  */
00681 float *IMB_float_profile_ensure(ImBuf *ibuf, int profile, int *alloc)
00682 {
00683     int predivide= (ibuf->flags & IB_cm_predivide);
00684     int profile_from, profile_to;
00685 
00686     /* determine profiles */
00687     if (ibuf->profile == IB_PROFILE_NONE)
00688         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
00689     else
00690         profile_from = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00691 
00692     if (profile == IB_PROFILE_NONE)
00693         profile_to = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
00694     else
00695         profile_to = IB_PROFILE_SRGB;
00696     
00697     if (profile_from == profile_to) {
00698         /* simple case, just allocate the buffer and return */
00699         *alloc= 0;
00700 
00701         if (ibuf->rect_float == NULL)
00702             IMB_float_from_rect(ibuf);
00703 
00704         return ibuf->rect_float;
00705     }
00706     else {
00707         /* conversion is needed, first check */
00708         float *fbuf= MEM_mallocN(ibuf->x * ibuf->y * sizeof(float) * 4, "IMB_float_profile_ensure");
00709         *alloc= 1;
00710 
00711         if (ibuf->rect_float == NULL) {
00712             IMB_buffer_float_from_byte(fbuf, (uchar*)ibuf->rect,
00713                 profile_to, profile_from, predivide,
00714                 ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00715         }
00716         else {
00717             IMB_buffer_float_from_float(fbuf, ibuf->rect_float,
00718                 4, profile_to, profile_from, predivide,
00719                 ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, ibuf->x);
00720         }
00721 
00722         return fbuf;
00723     }
00724 }
00725 
00726 /**************************** Color to Grayscale *****************************/
00727 
00728 /* no profile conversion */
00729 void IMB_color_to_bw(ImBuf *ibuf)
00730 {
00731     float *rctf= ibuf->rect_float;
00732     uchar *rct= (uchar*)ibuf->rect;
00733     int i;
00734 
00735     if (rctf) {
00736         for (i = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; i > 0; i--, rctf+=4)
00737             rctf[0]= rctf[1]= rctf[2]= rgb_to_grayscale(rctf);
00738     }
00739 
00740     if (rct) {
00741         for (i = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; i > 0; i--, rct+=4)
00742             rct[0]= rct[1]= rct[2]= rgb_to_grayscale_byte(rct);
00743     }
00744 }
00745 
00746 void IMB_buffer_float_clamp(float *buf, int width, int height)
00747 {
00748     int i, total = width*height*4;
00749     for (i = 0; i < total; i++) {
00750         buf[i] = MIN2(1.0, buf[i]);
00751     }
00752 }
00753 
00754 /**************************** alter saturation *****************************/
00755 
00756 void IMB_saturation(ImBuf * ibuf, float sat)
00757 {
00758     int i;
00759     unsigned char *rct= (unsigned char *)ibuf->rect;
00760     float *rctf= ibuf->rect_float;
00761     float hsv[3];
00762 
00763     if (rct) {
00764         float rgb[3];
00765         for (i = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; i > 0; i--, rct+=4) {
00766             rgb_uchar_to_float(rgb, rct);
00767             rgb_to_hsv(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2], hsv, hsv+1, hsv+2);
00768             hsv_to_rgb(hsv[0], hsv[1] * sat, hsv[2], rgb, rgb+1, rgb+2);
00769             rgb_float_to_uchar(rct, rgb);
00770         }
00771     }
00772 
00773     if (rctf) {
00774         for (i = ibuf->x * ibuf->y; i > 0; i--, rctf+=4) {
00775             rgb_to_hsv(rctf[0], rctf[1], rctf[2], hsv, hsv+1, hsv+2);
00776             hsv_to_rgb(hsv[0], hsv[1] * sat, hsv[2], rctf, rctf+1, rctf+2);
00777         }
00778     }
00779 }
